name: Kwak Kwak !
description:
Kwak Kwak is a 3D hyper casual game created for a scholar game jam by 5 students from the Institut de l'Internet et du Multimédia with the theme "Child's Game".

Story:

"Count! count them all!" as they flow through the river my grandpa would say, "Catch, catch them all as they need saving! It's the season to catch'n'save the ducks from the gloomy monster at the end of the river!". Each year those words of encouragement would echo in the valleys of heaven as we sit by the river bank.

Kwak Kwak! is a hypercasual where you incarnate a young child that's collecting duck toys from the river using a fish hook. It's a fun and repetitve game with emphasis on relaxed feelings and calmness, helps young kids to develop reflex.

            

Credits:

Karim BALLAN - Game Designer

Paul LEDUC - Programmer

Weilian CHEN - Game Artist

Mael BOURDELEIX - Communication Web

Linh PHAM  - 3D Artist
